document_data.caption: A map showing Mhalsymber's Way and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Mhalsymber's Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Mhalsymber's Way''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Mhalsymber's Way was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. The road ran north to south, connecting [[Golden Serpent Street]] in the north with [[Sammarin's Street]] in the south near the northwest corner of the [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]].
